line_1: Hold doctrines, by no scruples vex'd,
I am sometimes uneasy, but never quite vex'd;
line_2: With the cares of this world I am seldom perplex'd,

line_1: Where no Forms the Shepherd vex'd;
line_2: No Ill Tongue the Nymph perplex'd,

line_1: With equal rage a butcher vext,
line_2: To see the battel thus perplext,

line_1: Then I'd not be with any Trouble vex'd;
line_2: Nor have the Ev'ning of my Days perplex'd.

line_1: A Brazen Pot, by scouring vext,
line_2: With Beef and Pudding still perplext,

line_1: With anxious Doubts, with endless Scruples vext,
line_2: Is veil'd in Darkness, and perplext

line_1: With anxious Doubts, with endless Scruples vext,
line_2: And some Restraint imply'd from each perverted Text.

line_1: And now, I was not only vex'd,
By fear his soul, by pain his body vext,
line_2: By conscience tortured, and by doubt perplext,

line_1: By fear his soul, by pain his body vext,
line_2: Loathing this world, and shuddering at the next.

line_1: By sudden bursts of angry tempests vex'd
line_2: Irksome and long the passage was, perplex'd
